divs: Sighting Detailsdriving on I40 at 300am in the morning looked out windsheild and i saw a triangle shape object in the sky it was large on the rear two corners i saw lights changing colors from white to a greenish color when one light was white the other was green and they changed to the other coloor iwatched it tell it went behind the mountains iwas driving with a freind to A.S.U. i know it was 300am because my friends mother called him on his cell phone at the same time i think it was a militry project
Summary: large dark triaangle shape lights on rear corners changing from white to greenish color
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
